fr.ign.cogit.cartagen.software.interfacecartagen.interfacecore

Class Symbolisation

  • Object
    • Symbolisation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneralisationSymbolisation

    public abstract class Symbolisation
extends Object
    une symbolisation de couche. une instance de cette classe fournit une methode de dessin d'un objet sur une fenetre
    Author:
    julien Gaffuri 28 janv. 2009

      • lineOrSurfaceWidthColourTransparency

        public static Symbolisation lineOrSurfaceWidthColourTransparency(int widthPixels,
                                                                 Color lineColour,
                                                                 int lineTransparency,
                                                                 Color fillColour,
                                                                 int fillTransparency)
        Symbolisation typically to be associated with a ColouredFeature i.e. passed to the method LayerManager.addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry, Symbolisation) that constructs the ColouredFeature. This symbolisation is valid for linear or polygonal features. It does not take care of any AbstractLayerGroup. It draws linear features with the given values of line width in pixels, colour and transparency. If the feature is surfacic then its border is drawn with the given values line colour and transparency, and it is filled with the given values of fill colour and transparency. For transparencies, (0 = transparent, 255 = opaque)
        Parameters:
        widthPixels - Width of the line (of the border if surfacic feature), in pixels
        lineColour - Colour of the line (of the border if surfacic feature). The transparency component of the colour is ignored
        lineTransparency - Transparency of the line (of the border if surfacic feature)
        fillColour - Colour the surfacic feature should be filled with. The transparency component of the colour is ignored. If linear feature, the parameter is ignored.
        fillTransparency - Transparency of the fill colour. If linear feature, the parameter is ignored.
        Returns:
        the defined symbolisation

      • lineOrSurfaceWidthColourTransparency

        public static Symbolisation lineOrSurfaceWidthColourTransparency(double widthMM,
                                                                 Color lineColour,
                                                                 int lineTransparency,
                                                                 Color fillColour,
                                                                 int fillTransparency)
        Symbolisation typically to be associated with a ColouredFeature i.e. passed to the method LayerManager.addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry, Symbolisation) that constructs the ColouredFeature. This symbolisation is valid for linear or polygonal features. It does not take care of any AbstractLayerGroup. It draws linear features with the given values of line width in map millimeters, colour and transparency. If the feature is surfacic then its border is drawn with the given values line colour and transparency, and it is filled with the given values of fill colour and transparency. For transparencies, (0 = transparent, 255 = opaque)
        Parameters:
        widthMM - Width of the line (of the border if surfacic feature), in map mm
        lineColour - Colour of the line (of the border if surfacic feature). The transparency component of the colour is ignored
        lineTransparency - Transparency of the line (of the border if surfacic feature)
        fillColour - Colour the surfacic feature should be filled with. The transparency component of the colour is ignored. If linear feature, the parameter is ignored.
        fillTransparency - Transparency of the fill colour. If linear feature, the parameter is ignored.
        Returns:
        the defined symbolisation

      • lineOrSurfaceWidthColourTransparency

        public static Symbolisation lineOrSurfaceWidthColourTransparency(Color colour,
                                                                 int fillTransparency,
                                                                 double widthMM)
        Symbolisation typically to be associated with a ColouredFeature i.e. passed to the method LayerManager.addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry, Symbolisation) that constructs the ColouredFeature. This symbolisation is valid for linear or polygonal features. It does not take care of any AbstractLayerGroup. It draws the line (resp. the border of the polygon) with the (opaque) colour passed as parameter and the width passed as parameter, and if polygon, fills it with the same colour having the transparency passed as parameter. THE LINE WIDTH IS IN MAP MM
        Parameters:
        colour - the colour to draw with
        fillTransparency - the transparency for the filling of the polygon (0 = transparent, 255 = opaque). Will be ignored if the feature to draw is linear
        widthMM - Width of the line (of the border if surfacic feature), in map mm
        Returns:
        the defined symbolisation

      • lineOrSurfaceWidthColourTransparency

        public static Symbolisation lineOrSurfaceWidthColourTransparency(Color colour,
                                                                 int fillTransparency,
                                                                 int widthPixels)
        Symbolisation typically to be associated with a ColouredFeature i.e. passed to the method LayerManager.addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry, Symbolisation) that constructs the ColouredFeature. This symbolisation is valid for linear or polygonal features. It does not take care of any AbstractLayerGroup. It draws the line (resp. the border of the polygon) with the (opaque) colour passed as parameter and the width passed as parameter, and if polygon, fills it with the same colour having the transparency passed as parameter. THE LINE WIDTH IS IN PIXELS
        Parameters:
        colour - the colour to draw with
        fillTransparency - the transparency for the filling of the polygon (0 = transparent, 255 = opaque). Will be ignored if the feature to draw is linear
        widthPixels - Width of the line (of the border if surfacic feature), in map mm
        Returns:
        the defined symbolisation

      • lineOrSurfaceColourTransparency

        public static Symbolisation lineOrSurfaceColourTransparency(Color colour,
                                                            int fillTransparency)
        Symbolisation typically to be associated with a ColouredFeature i.e. passed to the method LayerManager.addToGeometriesPool(IGeometry, Symbolisation) that constructs the ColouredFeature. This symbolisation is valid for linear or polygonal features. It does not take care of any AbstractLayerGroup. It draws the line (resp. the border of the polygon) with the (opaque) colour passed as parameter, and if polygon, fills it with the same colour having the transparency passed as parameter. The width of the line/border is 1 pixel
        Parameters:
        colour - the colour to draw with
        fillTransparency - the transparency for the filling of the polygon (0 = transparent, 255 = opaque). Will be ignored if the feature to draw is linear
        Returns:
        the defined symbolisation
